hero.headline: Essential Style. No Excess.
hero.paragraph1: Discover basic clothing with minimalist design and urban attitude. Versatile pieces, made to last and combine with everything — from casual to sophisticated.
hero.heroImageAlt: Model wearing basic streetwear style clothing

ourPhilosophy.subtitle: Our Philosophy
ourPhilosophy.headline: Timeless, Conscious, and Essential
ourPhilosophy.paragraph1: We create clothing that stands the test of time — in style, quality, and purpose. No excesses, no fleeting trends. Just what's essential, made with intention.
ourPhilosophy.paragraph2: Smart design. Responsible production. Lasting style.

essentialSection.subtitle: Commitment to the Essential
essentialSection.headline: Details That Make the Difference
essentialSection.paragraph1: From fabric selection to precise tailoring, each piece is made to fit comfortably and suit any occasion. The design is subtle, but made to last — in time and style.
essentialSection.paragraph2: Because true luxury lies in well-made simplicity.

modaSection.subtitle: Responsible Production
modaSection.headline: Unrushed Fashion
modaSection.paragraph1: We value the time it takes to do things well. Our pieces are created in small collections, with respect for the process, people, and the planet.

reviews.title: Absolutely perfect!
reviews.description1: I was really impressed with the whole shopping experience. The packaging was thoughtful and elegant.
reviews.description2: The quality of the clothes is outstanding, and the fit was spot-on. I’ve already recommended the store to friends!

reviews.name: Felipe R.
reviews.title: Stylish and comfortable
reviews.description1: The clothes are incredibly comfortable and stylish — perfect for everyday wear and even semi-formal events.
reviews.description2: Fast delivery and excellent customer service. I’ll definitely be shopping here again!

reviews.name: Beatriz M.
reviews.title: My wardrobe favorites
